As part of the [Infra Wiss Blogs](https://infrawissblogs.org/) project funded by the German Research Foundation (DFG), we invite you to a webinar on the topic of archiving scholarly blogs. This webinar will focus on the [Rogue Scholar](https://preview.rogue-scholar.org/de) service by [Front Matter](https://front-matter.io/). After an introduction to the Infra Wiss Blogs project, we will present and discuss how WordPress-hosted scholarly blogs can be archived with Rogue Scholar. This will be followed by user reports on their experiences of using Rogue Scholar. The webinar will conclude with an open discussion.

The webinar is aimed at scholars, bloggers, experts from information infrastructures and anyone involved in digital scholarly communication and sustainable archiving. The Webinar will be held in German.

**Date:** Wednesday, June 11th 2025

**Duration:** 10:00 - 11:30

**Please register here:** <https://hu.berlin/infrawissblogs>

**Contact:** [catharina.ochsner\@hu-berlin.de](mailto:catharina.ochsner@hu-berlin.de)
